Name: Menu Please!
About the game: Demo Is Available / You know you're a top class Chef, but are you ready to prove it? Show off your Cooking Skills, manage your Resources and Cook in huge Restaurants. Host customers from 3 different levels. At level 1, manage a dessert shop and bake delicious donuts and cupcakes. At level 2, manage a small fastfood shop, serve delicious fries and drinks. At level 3, manage a large restaurant, cook burgers, sandwiches, cookies, pizza and much more and prove that your restaurant is the best. Cook A Variety Of Dishes On Three Different Levels. Prepare Great Meals for Your Customers Bake The Best Cookies Show Your Cooking Skills
